description:
WinX Mobile Video Converter

Your Ultimate Choice to Fast Convert Any Videos to Any Android Mobile Devices

It is a brand-new fast video converter to convert MKV, AVI, MP4, WMV, MOV, FLV, AVCHD, M2TS videos to any pop Android mobiles, tablets and players, which enables you to play different videos on The New HTC One, Android Samsung Galaxy S4, Galaxy Note 3 , Amazon Kindle Fire, Google New Nexus 7, etc. It has as many as 200 built-in profiles, covering all prevailed Android devices with different resolutions and screen sizes.
Besides converting SD/HD/Multi-track HD videos to Android compatible video/music formats stably, it also can convert Blu-ray M2TS videos, HDTV videos, camcorder and phone recorded videos to Apple iPhone 5S/5C, Microsoft WP8 and Nokia mobiles to fulfill your dream of playing any videos on Android iOS Google devices on the go!

Features:

Convert Videos to Android Mobile Phones 
As a mobile phone video converter, it converts SD, HD, recorded videos and Blu-ray videos to Android mobiles, e.g., play MKV, M2TS, MOD, MPEG, FLV, MP4 on HTC One X, Galaxy Note 3/S4, Google, Motorola, Acer, Huawei, Nokia and Blackberry mobiles anywhere anytime.

Play Videos on Android Table Computers
You don't have to bother about video formats. You can convert any videos, like MKV, AVCHD, WMV, AVI to Google Nexus 7, Kindle Fire, HTC, Samsung, Asus, Nokia, Surface and other tablets. Apple users may also convert videos to iPad Air/Mini (Retina) and iPhone 5S/5C with facility.

Feature-rich Video Editor & Ringtone Maker
Now you are the master of videos! Its video editing feature helps crop, trim, merge videos and adding external *.srt subtitle to your downloaded movies. You can also convert any video to MP3/AAC/FLAC/ALAC music and edit to make personalized phone ringtone.

Light-hearted Recorded Video Conversion
This best Android mobile video converter can also convert videos recorded by cameras and cell phones to MP4, MP3, H264, AVI, WMV2, etc. It lets you replenish your video collection or upload and share the self-recorded videos on FaceBook, Blog, YouTube, and so on.

Output First-class Video Audio Quality
The unmatchable De-interlacing Engine and High Quality Engine together assist in converting standard and high definition videos to Android devices while maximally preserving the original video audio quality. Parameters of bitrate and resolution are adjustable for the output movies.

Provide Fast Video Conversion Speed
In support of Intel Core i5 i7 and multi-core CPUs, it guarantees fast and stable video to Android iPhone iPad conversion process. The optimized AMD 3DNow! and SSE3 SSE2 MMX Instructions deliver 15x faster real-time conversion speed.

Support video conversion in batch mode to allow adding more than one video file at one time.
